name.en: Destined Doom of the Defiant Souls
name.ja: <ruby>叛<rt>はん</rt></ruby><ruby>骨<rt>こつ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>命<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>運<rt>うん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster.

effect.en: Choose up to 2 Attack Position Level 5 or lower WIND Attribute Zombie Type monsters on your field. This turn, those monsters cannot be destroyed by battle or your opponent's card effects.
